content.detailedDescription:
my father was stationed at federal penitentiary outside of boron ca. (generally the federal government assigned former military outpost or government related properties to serve as federal penitentiaries.) we lived in the  former military housing of this once radio communications transmission outpost for edwards air force base. we were 33 miles from edwards. it's now abandoned. 
one afternoon in the fall of 1979 i was walking home from the bus stop with my sister to discover a extremely large very low flying 'ship'  moving toward us from the west and hovering directly above our house. it was a massive ship and shaped like the tip of an obselisk and massive it was so close i could see clearly the underside of the ship.  the ship was black, the surface was textured like sand. the underside of the ship had recessed symbols and shapes; trapezoids triangle and other  geometric patterns that looked hieroglyphic.  the ship was massive. it was larger than our home and made no sound at all. my sister and i stared at it for about 35  seconds. the ship then ascended directly up words slowly by about 50 feet then slid back towards the west and 50 feet then zagged to the right or east another 75 feet or so.  it then shot to the north east like a bullet. my sister and i waited to hear the sonic boom as we were accustomed to seeing the space shuttle maneuvers. we never heard it there was no sonic boom and at that speed it should've generated one. 
 about 10 years after that event i met chuck yeager through one of my former classmates whose father served and was very close to mr. yeager. after i described to him in detail what i saw he answered me saying it was probably the harrier av-8b at which i laughed;  it wasn't remotely similar. 

i can send to you a google maps pin drop of the exact location/house of where i saw the ship
thank you for your time. feel free to contact me if you have any questions
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My sister and i observed hovering over our home walking home from bus stop.We were stationed in a prior military out post near edwards airforce base

content.detailedDescription: It was around 1445 on 7/29/2017. i was behind my home using my water hose to was out my home air filters. at the same time i noticed several wasp nest on eve's of my home. i started knocking them down with the water hose when i saw a tear shaped object. the sky was clear with just a few white clouds. i would have never knew the object was flying by if i had not been looking up toward the eve's of my home. the object had to be pretty large because it was high above the clouds as i lost sight of it as it flew above the few clouds that were above me. the object made no sound and left no con trail as it flew. the object was outlined in white that matched the color of the clouds. inside the tear drop shape was a second white colored tear drop shape. this appeared to be part of the object. in between the first and second tear drop the objects color was the same as the sky.The whole sighting lasted less than a seven seconds. i have never seen anything like this before. i have seen plenty of aircraft from military aircraft, c17, c130's, f16's, and helicopters to civilian aircraft along with balloons and blimps. i did not have my phone so i could not take a picture. i did not have time to call my wife to come out to see the object as it was moving so fast. i got the impression the objects color was on purpose to help conceal it. a person would have to be looking right at the object to notice it at all.
content.summary: Noticed a tear drop shaped, blue/white object above the clouds flying from right to left, no sound, no con trail.

content.detailedDescription: there are back again. have identical puncture wounds on both lower arms. also both wrists have a scraped area on them that dosnt heal well. third time puncture wuonds have occured in over a year time.Wrists are sort of scraped raw
content.summary: 35  to 50 feet in diameter, had one bright light at bottom had baffels like material connecting to light

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pics and my wife was there i did t notice anything u till my wife noticed some shape i assumed a me s reflection as some seem but there are a.Feww that have symmetry and shape. i believe it's worth reporting  because an expert would know better. i have pics if you want to see them.
content.summary: Was talking sunset pics and thought it was lens but some are  possibly structural when zooming in

content.detailedDescription:
Occurred : 7/28/2016
i went walking far away from my house across the highway in the back roads to a field.

after i turned on my flashlight because it was really dark. i looked up in the tree with my flashlight and i could barley see it but it was a light that got really bright it seemed to me like it was aurora bright. it shined through the tree and i could tell because of my flashlight with in 2 to 4 seconds it disappeared with no sound at all after it passed the trees from left to right it seemed like. i tried to hurry fast and look passed the tree to actually see it and it could have been a spiral light but im not sure at all really it was some where between 12:00 to 3:00 when i seen that.



(update 7/29/17)

i have been either really paranoid or something i have had strong vivid dreams. 5 or 6 of them have to do with seeing craft and 2 or 3 with alien beings. im not sure at all if they mean anything at all or not everything i have experienced in my dreams are very intense and scary. so i had to at least explain that for some comfort. the reaction i got from seeing this gave me goose bumps sent me straight into panic and i was scared i was taken or abducted because i was the only one there but now im not so sure about anything at all. i found this video on your last 20 ufo reports and it acts almost exactly like what i had seen by myself (this video i attached is not my video i do not take credit) i just happen to download and find it myself on this site.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Big light in front of dark clouds and behind trees; brighter than my flashlight

content.detailedDescription: At the pool looking at the sky observed two highly reflective objects at very high altitude moving from north to south on semi parallel trajectories. objects were glittering unlike any aircraft i've observed before.Very strange.Also observed high altitude aircraft in their vacinity that looked normal.This day did not have a cloud in the sky. i have no idea of what we observed. no dimensional information could be oobserved.
content.summary: Two highly refective objects traveling from north to south at very high altitude and parallel flight path. objects left no contrail and had very unusual refective characteristics unlike any aircraft i've observef.

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed a bright light in the blue sky that was much higher than the helicopters that were flying low over my house at 101 north and 280 and 680 highway is san jose california this afternoon i thought it was a highflying plane.

 it's seem to slow down and curve just a fraction and that made me realize that it was in the airplane. i ran to get my cell phone to take a picture. i came back and it was still there. it literally had moved. there's another helicopter in the background but i wasn't going to lose my view of this thing. 
 now i thought i hit the video button and was taking about 40 seconds of this object giving you a clear view of the umbrellas in my backyard and the roof of my house and this outing in the sky as it was stationary almost 86° or my home over downtown san jose. i will see how someone didn't have this thing in their site a radar as much traffic as around here. to my horror and fright after narrating what i thought was live video and zooming in and out and gneedless to say i was still in picture mode and only managed to take the initial picture but i hit the button with!!   arrgghh!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: low-flying helicopter headed east over 101 north and 280/680interchange where i live.  as i saw it fly over i noticed i have another vehicle, and saw that it was a light and begin to watch it and did not follow helicopter.  stopped an eastern path ....

content.detailedDescription: I was travelling at 65mph sb on hwy 285 at lookout rd. in boulder county at approximately 0505am on 07/29/17.  i was distracted by a very bright flash of blueish-white light off to my right (south, southwest of my location).  as i looked to my right just as i was about to pass lookout rd. i observed the same flash of light four more times as it moved rapidly in about 1/4 mile increments to the west.  i stopped my car just south of lookout rd. and observed the light move directly north along w. 95th st. and one more bright flash near a grove of trees  about 1/2 mile north of lookout rd.  i observed the light sustain for about 10 seconds more as i lost sight of it behind a hill crest.  the light then dissipated and i could no longer see it.  i stayed in the area to see if it repeated ie:equipment lights, air traffic warning lights, etc. but there was no repeat and the event ended.  i later checked the area on my way home from work and did not see any evidence of ground interference or lights installed on nearby high tension electric systems.  the lights i witnessed were much lower to the ground and could not have come from anything higher than 50 feet.  i nearby resident said their irrigation systems did not have lights so i was able to rule that out as a cause.  i brightness of the lights was intense, much brighter than my 840lumen flashlight and there were no aircraft sounds in the area at the time.  i can provide a map/drawing of the area if needed.
content.summary: Very bright light emitted in distinct pattern from east to west 1mi, then north 1/2mi

content.detailedDescription: Hello, i don’t know if there were any reports of ufos over or near chicago on saturday, july 22, 2017, but i was out on the chicago river (at the crook of the n/s branches) before sunset and i captured something in one of my photos. i’ve never reported anything like this before but i am curious to know if there might’ve been others that witnessed something in the skies over chicago around 17:40 cdt. i am attaching the photos to this so you can see that near the building in the middle (300 n. lasalle) near trump tower, there is a black object there that i can’t describe. i didn’t notice it until i reviewed my photos later. i usually take multiple shots in a row and in the previous two, it’s not there. unfortunately this object is in the last burst shot (for 1/400sec). it’s not a dirty lens/sensor, because i would’ve seen that in the previous shot. upon zooming in the photo, it doesn't look like a jet, helicopter or even a dirigible; it's nothing identifiable. please can you help me identify this object? after i reviewed my photos and saw this, i was at a loss of words. i didn't notice this outside of the photos, just after i reviewed my photos.
content.summary: Black object appears in one of my photos.

content.detailedDescription: I was in north highlands, california. i was arguing with my boyfriend at the time and he was in the garage while i was in his room. his room has a large window that has a perfect view of the entire front house. i was laying down on the couch which is placed in front of the window and i happened to glance up and saw an airplane. i enjoy looking up at the stars at night and watching airplanes fly by (there's an airport close so it's very common to see them). the second i looked down i noticed that there was all the sudden a very bright flashing light moving in the sky so i looked up and it was moving in a downwards direction. at first i thought that maybe it was a star but after watching it for more than 30 seconds it was clearly not. this object was round and had bright lights surrounding it. im not sure if the flashing lights were under or around the object because it was so far away but to me it looked like it was under it. there were definitely multiple lights but in the video it looks like one. the object, again, was flying in a downwards path but it seemed to scatter side to side a few times before i lost sight of it behind a tree. i went on google and typed in "flashing light in the sky" and it took me to multiple websites about ufo sightings and found an article with the same type of image i saw/recorded. today i came across your website and decided to share my experience with you guys. i hope this helps!! :)
content.summary: Round flashing object moving downwards in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
This report is entered by the georgia state director at the request of the two reporting witnesses. text sent directly to the sd outside from cms, is used here; all that follows are *direct quotes with only minor editing:
(reporting witness) for about 3 weeks we have been seeing strange lights and objects near our home. we haven't had chance to fill out the reporting form, but we are still seeing really strange things in sky at night. 
yesterday afternoon we believe we witnessed a type of port-hole or something. it was around 630 maybe 7 pm, we were coming into our driveway, the clouds were blowing east, and way up in the sky the clouds looked like a tornado spinning, and objects were coming out of the bottom. unfortunately neither of us had a phone at the time but soon as reached the house, we saw unusual clouds. well saturday night we decided to entertain the lights in sky, so me & cathy and my two sons give them something to watch, lol. at first there were only about 10 flying around, and my two sons put flashing lights on themselves; so did cathy, but i wrapped my entire body in christmas lights we and all had play light-sabers that were my son's lol. we danced around and had fights with the light-sabers, gave them one hell of a show. after about 20 mins the sky was full of these lights. for some reason mine and cathy's phones both say 'no more storage' and won't let us take pictures or videos. we even deleted many things to make room but still can't. last night we took a magnet and ran it over puncture places on my body & to our amazement each one has an object that will move with the magnet.
(additional witness) i believe _____ has contacted you as well. we have (in the last few days) experienced the most interesting, terrifying, life-changing events i hope i will ever have. around the first of june we noticed a few stars weren't stars. they blinked, mostly red and green, and darted all over, or hovered, there were also translucent triangles, & big white lights. it gradually became a living scifi series that occurred nightly. at one point there was the  most unusual thunder. we thought it was over but it's not. please help us; we have some video and many pictures. thank you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: For about 3 weeks we have been seeing strange lights and objects near our home

content.detailedDescription:
July 28,2017

on july 8, 2017 at 5:35 pm my oldest daughter and her spouse, and my middle daughter and i were standing outside of our station wagon at elberta, michigan looking southwest across betsie bay at frankfort, mi. admiring the lake view. i happened to turn around and looked up and saw this large orange disc high in the sky. i am a pilot and familiar with planes. this was not a plane, no blinking lights and the speed it was traveling across the sky was beyond the speed of a commercial flight. i quickly asked my middle daughter to take out her phone and video it. by the time she did (and put it on video) it was acting strangely. according to her video which was focused in on it, it was moving erratically. visually all we could see was it was speeding across the sky heading southwest in a straight line until it disappeared. we were all aghast at the view and excited. i have been looking for a ufo since i heard about the roswell incident, which happened the day after my marriage, so it was gratifying to finally see one.
robert hatch
content.summary: Orange light moving rapidly across zenith. close up view appeared bouncing

content.detailedDescription: I first noticed the huge disc hovering when i turned off the news and looked out over the lake.  i was in shock and it scared me to death...The technology was amazing to say the least!  certainly not something from the world we know.  it did not make a sound and everything on and around the lake also did not make a sound.  it was as if the world had stopped in place.  i called my daughters to come see it.  one came and the other slept through it.  i called the police immediately and reported it.  then i tried to call fairchild afb and their phones were not working.  i called nellis afb and demanded that i speak to the general and they actually woke him up. i formerly had a top secret clearance working in washington, d.C.  he thought it might be a weather balloon and checked...No, he said, there were none in the area.  he asked what i was seeing and i told him.  he sent two men up from his base the following day. my daughter and i watched it hover for a long time and it then slowly moved across the lake ne and settled to the ground just beyond a rill in the hill. the police arrived and said they would go to a higher vantage point to see it. they called from mt. schweitzer which was too far away and could see nothing.  i woke up my other daughter and we all sat together in my bed hoping to stay awake to see it take off.  i fell asleep about 3:30 a.M. and when i awoke at 5:30 a.M. both of my daughters had fallen asleep, so we did not see it leave.  that morning we drove to find where it had landed and we found their landing pods (2).  the ground was burned where it looked like two pods had touched down as landing supports.  weird small plants had began to grow about two inches high at the time. squares of about 20 ft. by 20 ft. each. as we were hiking up the hill to see if there was anything else, i got a weird feeling and ordered the girls to the truck urgently.  just as we started the truck and pulled out onto the road, a chevy suburban grey with a small red stripe came by on the wrong side of the road.  my daughter could see them better than i as all i could see was from their noses down and the passenger's hands on the dash. she screamed and said punch it, mom. they scared her to death.  the thing that stood out most was the distance from their nose to their upper lip.  much longer than humans. the hands had quite long fingers. the next day the two men from nellis showed up and i took them to the spot where the landing pods had been and they took soil samples, tested for radiation and it was positive, took the photo my daughter had drawn (excellent artist) of the men and thanked me and left.  i never heard from them again.  the one man told me the visitors could walk through walls, etc.  i couldn't decide if he was trying to scare me or what his intentions were.  other odd things happened the following week and i will never forget any of this as long as i live.  i didn't mention it to anyone after that for fear they would think me crazy.  months later we had our driveway snowplowed and i ask him "what's new?"  he said "oh, my wife saw a flying saucer."  so i know we weren't the only ones to see it in the area.  i've searched the archives and there is absolutely no mention of this sighting in sagle or any others for that matter.  the police should have a record and so should nellis afb for sure.
content.summary: Huge and quiet......No noise at all from animals or ufo.  usually frogs croaking, etc. at night.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out of my kitchen window when i observed what i thought was a helicopter. but the light pattern did not match any helicopter i'd ever seen. the object was to high and large to be a drone, and again, the light configuration did not seem to match a drone. the object just hovered for about 2 minutes. it did not wobble, yaw or rotate. a commercial airliner descended out of the cloud cover and the object began to move slowly away from it and then it just shot off at rocket speed.
content.summary: A solid red light with 3 pulsating white lights next to it. no fuselage

content.detailedDescription:
7/25 ~10pm: in my yard looking at stars. noticed a very bright light move from wsw to ese. observed with binoculars, but could not see a shape or navigation lights. object was brighter and moved slower than other aircraft observed. 

7/26 ~10pm: same place. observed object matching description above. observed with binoculars with same results as above.

7/27 ~10pm: waited for object to appear. it passed over at roughly the same time as the other observed objects, but on a slightly more northerly track. again observed with binoculars, but could not see nav lights or the shape of the object.

7/28 9:45 10:15pm: waited for object, but it did not appear.

my house is near an afb and flight paths to/from a large airport. i am used to seeing and observing aircraft flying at night. i have also observed what i took to be satellites and very high flying aircraft. this object was unusual in that it was roughly the brightness of venus, (which was not visible). it moved slower than aircraft and satellites that i've seen. it seemed to large and bright to be a satellite, and did not display navigation or other lights which i expect to see on aircraft.

i expect that this is an aircraft of some kind, but the anomalies in its appearance have bothered me enough to try to find out what it was. can you help me? are there other resources that could help me identify it? thank you for your consideration.
content.summary: Light traveled slowly, was brighter than observed aircraft. no nav lights. observed 3 nights consecutive at 10pm 7/25-7/27

content.detailedDescription: I was walking and praying on forest service road near my home in san bernardino mountains approx 19 miles west of big bear lake. approx 7000 ft elevation. i looked up and noticed beautiful pink/blue laced swirling cloud formations. i took 2 pics with my iphone, i did not see anything at the time.  later while viewing the pics i noticed blue cigar shaped  object.  from  1st to 2nd pic it ascended  broke into  4-5 objects of the same color but different shapes. i have never seen anything like it before. we have had some intermittent monsunal clouds the past week but the day was warm sunny and the skies mostly clear.
content.summary: Took pics of unusual pink blue laced clouds and later saw blue long  object was a n 1st pic break into 4/5 blue objects in 2nd pic. object ascended in seconds between pics.

content.detailedDescription: Leaving a parking lot, the object was directly in front of me but at a distance away. not moving. lasted only 5-10 seconds before going into a cloud.
content.summary: Bright, pipe shape like stainless steel., larger than a plane.

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling to work at about 8:45 am on 295 headed south into portland, maine and saw a golden/white sphere just below the clouds. it was very bright and looked like it could be a mirror reflecting sunlight. the sun was covered by clouds, so the object stood out. it floated in place, i went around a bend and when i came back around it was gone entirely (maybe 3 or 4 minutes passed). 

i regularly see planes and helicopters in the area but the object did not look like either (although i could be mistaken and it could be a helicopter). it looked spherical and shimmered/glowed a white/gold color and remained perfectly still, it reminded me of a fishing lure but in the sky. it was very noticeable against the clouds that were a dark gray. i was surprised to see it over the harbor of portland in broad daylight, i assume other drivers nearby must've seen it as well. it wasn't a safe time or place to pull over and take a photo, otherwise i would have taken one.
content.summary: White/gold sphere just below clouds hovering in place. at first i thought it was a plane or helicopter.

content.detailedDescription:
Four of us were sitting at takhlakh lake.  7 miles north west of mt adams.   we were there watching for ufo’s.  we all get together one a year for night watching.  a thought popped in to my head.  i saw the ufo coming in from the south and then descending down over the highest point on the mountain.  five minutes later i started to get the funny feeling again i turned my head around to look for our group leader and i noticed him pacing behind me.  i said hay do you feel anxious he said yes he was.  this is typical for the two of us before something happens.  he then said i hope they show themselves before it gets totally dark so we can video them with the mountain.  we had 3 camera set ups:  two luna optics ln-dm50-hrsd 5-20x44 hd night vision monocular set up on tripods with 7” monitors.  also a canon 7d set up for long exposure shots of the sky.  
9:15 a light appeared over mt adams.  then another smaller light down to the left of the much larger light.  our leader said is that moving.  then both of us started to fumble to get our cameras going.  in the meantime another light appeared to the lower right of the large light.  so now we have a triangle of three lights descending towards the top of the mountain.  i got my luna going while our group leader was still working with his.  i caught about 13 seconds of video with two of the lights, the main light went down right over the highest point on the mountain.  the whole event lasted about 3-4 minutes
content.summary: Three lights appeared over mt adams then descend to the top of the mountain

content.detailedDescription: I was inside of my home and heard noise. i got up and looked out of the front window. i wasn't sure what i was seeing at the time until years later. i saw something disk shaped rolling down the street towards an abandoned train station. it was sideways so the sharp edge was scratching along the street as it rolled down. i remember seeing military personal chasing it down as well. i was a little girl so who knows if it could have been just a dream i had. because i don't remember anything else past that point and i was scared. but i do remember that there was no crack in the middle of my street before that night. but in the morning when i went out and looked there was a crack all the way down the street and no one believed me when i told them my story and said i was just dreaming.
content.summary: "ufo" rolled down my street.

content.detailedDescription:
Pictures taken at a construction area, work place. 
at that time i did not notice anything strange. no sound, no light.
i take pictures there all the time. i just saw something strange a few month after i took them while looking back at them. 
as you may see in the sequence of pictures, one taken after the other, in the  second one there is something strange in the sky, gone by the third picture.
content.summary: Sequence of pictures taken one ofter another. did not notice anything strange at the time when the pictures where taken, only see it after a few month of having taken them.

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on hwy 185 west of  washington mo. lights where bright. a hellicopter  flying very slow in what appeared to be a circle or maybe hovering.  it was pretty cool when i got to a clear, open field area where i could see all 4 lights in the triangle pattern.  the lights just quit shining.
content.summary: It was dark a triangle shape light pattern with one light in the center. possible a.R.V.-tr3b

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were sitting on the roof of our apartment listening to music and i looked up, seeing 10 objects moving at uniform speed across the sky, 3/4 of which were changing direction in circle/ spiral patterns. they moved what i believe to be in a southerly direction, and we're followed by 3 ufos moving in a v shape with another 2 behind them 5 minutes later. orbs were also seen in the location moving in the same direction as the other ufos. none of them made a noise, and were not aircraft you would usually identify in the sky. we were near an airport so we know the distance and noise of these craft and these were definitely not one of them. once i saw it i leapt up out of my chair and for the following hot i felt so happy and excited to see them but also a little ut scared. as soon as i saw it i was overcome with lots of emotion that never show together. i was frightened, happy, sad, delighted all at once. we lost sight of the object as they moved out of eyesight
content.summary: 10 lights overhead changing direction with no noise followed by 5 more 5 minutes later

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up to my dog crying/ hiding by my bed, when i heard a noise coming from down stairs. it was almost like i was in a trance but awake. i got out of bed to look but my dog stayed there and would not move for that spot which is not normal for him. i walked downstairs quietly and went to my kitchen. where i saw a little purple/grey being .. kind of human like but small maybe 3ft at most. he was standing on my counter top  touching the clock on my wall . it looked to me that he was putting it back. i started to say ( i knew you were real ) and that's when he jumped off the counter as i was walking up to him. he did not say anything he just grabbed me by the hand and walked me to my cellar door and down the stairs... this is when all goes black and can't remember anything after .. i woke up the next morning very tired. i told this all to my family but everyone says i was dreaming.. but it was so vivid it was not like any dream i had before or since. ever since that day i've been getting deje vu many times a day almost everyday.  
        i would not be the first in my family that this has happened. a  different experience has happened to my aunt when she was a younger  in the same house i am now. she told me she was taken right out of her room. also my mother and her friend said and are convinced they saw some kind of craft from the back yard when they were in there teens... 
       but anyway this is what happened to me. thanks for listening
content.summary: Heard noise in house went to look and it was there in my kitchen doing something  with a clock

content.detailedDescription:
1. ich war auf der terrasse um zu rauchen.
2. dieses regelmäßige pulsierende licht im süden.
3. ein planet venus oder der mars, aber die konstellation war nicht richtig zu der zeit.
4. es wechselte langsam die position, und dachte mir das es sich um ein flugobjekt handeln muss.
5. ich habe nie an sowas geglaubt, aber seit dem abend weiß ich dass wir nicht alleine sind.
6. es ist hinter den baumkronen im osten verschwunden.
content.summary: Es bewegte sich nach oben, unten, links und rechts, aber im langsamen tempo.

content.detailedDescription: My husband was outback havn a cig when he ran in yelled for me to come see,and wow!!! brite red orange yellow looked firey at first then moved slowley.I waved at it so i could possibly feel anything like 'it sees us waving.A very xciting moment for sure! watch the vid from my iphone6 zoom up whikecwatching youl clearly see it spinning til a hole in center amazing..Plz get back to me afte viewing the vid..Warmest regards karla yarnell
content.summary: Very brite red yellow orange and green.Very xciting to

content.detailedDescription:
1.I was driving home with my family after grabbing some dinner to bring home .
2.My histband in the passenger seat kept telling me to look at something in the sky 
3. i wanted to say the objects were planes or helicopters but they looked nothing like either of those .
4./6. when i first saw the objects there were  fireball looking ufo's  . there were 5 in a v formation flying steady in the same direction as our car. then as i drove off the freeway for a better look  there were now 3 ufo 's in a triangle formation and the first  ufo at the head of the triangle was speeding up in the same direction it had been (west) until i could not see it . then there were 2 that hovered over our city library until one of the ufo's also started to speed off west in the same direction as the other had . now there was one last and that  had stayed hovered over the library for about 10 min . i got closer to see if i could hear sound or make out the object better . i couldn't hear sound or get a better look other than it looked like a fireball with green and red flashing light occasionally toward the end of my sighting . as my family was hungry i didn't watch to see what the ufo hovering did but as i left the scene it stayed hovered and had zero sound 

5.  my feelings  were confused ,excited and interested  .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: V for formation of 5 then 3 in a triangle form then 2 then 1 hovering alone

content.detailedDescription:
Was letting the dog out to go potty and decided to stay out with the dog because the sky was unusually clear tonight. not a cloud in the night sky and no noticeable haze. looking to the west i thought that the sky was so clear that i could even make out the pleiades constellation. however that didn't seem correct because i thought that they were usually more of a winter observation. at that moment of thought, the constellation appeared to be drifting towards the south/ south west. after drifting approx. 60deg of travel, it faded away. 
the object from my perspective appeared to be double the size of a jet liner fuselage but without wings. jet liners often fly overhead but the other direction (clockwise to cmh) and make noise. this made no sound. the object seemed to be fuzzy without a defined edge. it resembled the splash of a ground to sky floodlight against a cloud, but there were no clouds in the sky and no noticeable floodlight beam from the ground, just a light-up spot in the sky that i thought was the pleiades but moving slowly (drifting) to the south. 
later i verified on a star chart that the object was initially spotted in the location between the constellations of hercules and lyra. it seemed to have about a dozen lights that i thought were the small close stars of the pleiades. they seemed to stay in their initial pattern. the object passed out of my view behind a tree then reemerged on the other side, i cannot be certain that the pattern of stars were still the same after reemerging or if they had changed. last that i saw of the object the stars on it seemed to fade away like it was banking up sharply and i could no longer see it in the sky. the time should have been about 12:50 am when this flew by. i was not bothered emotionally but felt surprised that i had spotted something weird.
a small plane flew from north west to north east about 5 minutes later. then i went inside.
content.summary: Thought it was pleiades but it drifted south then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside to walk my dog late at night and saw a what looked like a star that was oddly bright red and stationary.  this was unlike anything i have ever seen at that altitude (seemed like it was a close star in the sky) but at least 20,000 - 30,000 ft in the skyline. suddenly, the "star"  turned green and continued to be stationary ( 4-5 seconds) before it began moving westerly quickly, stopped and became stationary again for 1-2 seconds, then turned red again then traveled east quickly, stopped and was stationary again for 10-15 seconds or more. then became and stayed green for several seconds as it stayed stationary.  it then reverted west again for a short time then immediately fell (or traveled) south down past the horizon out of sight.  i have never gone out at night and witnessed in the high sky (where one would look at the stars) and see a definitive red star (like the color of a red light at a traffic light) just sitting in the sky.  as i looked and asked myself, "what is that!?", i realized it was very unusual.  that is when it turned green and i became fixated on watching it as long as i could track it.  i have lived here at this address for two years and have never seen anything like this in the sky or star gazing.  it was a very unusual experience.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Stationary light that quickly moved and changed directions many times.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were sitting on the roof of our apartment listening to music and i looked up, seeing 10 objects moving at uniform speed across the sky, 3/4 of which were changing direction in circle/ spiral patterns. they moved what i believe to be in a southerly direction, and we're followed by 3 ufos moving in a v shape with another 2 behind them 5 minutes later. orbs were also seen in the location moving in the same direction as the other ufos. none of them made a noise, and were not aircraft you would usually identify in the sky. we were near an airport so we know the distance and noise of these craft and these were definitely not one of them. once i saw it i leapt up out of my chair and for the following hot i felt so happy and excited to see them but also a little ut scared. as soon as i saw it i was overcome with lots of emotion that never show together. i was frightened, happy, sad, delighted all at once. we lost sight of the object as they moved out of eyesight
content.summary: 10 lights overhead changing direction with no noise followed by 5 more 5 minutes later
